summary: Production Team: So! For today’s Run BTS episode, you all would be paragliding from top of Mount Everest, landing in a jungle,...
body:
Production Team: So! For today’s Run BTS episode, you all would be paragliding from top of Mount Everest, landing in a jungle, where you would cross a bridge whose 90% steps are missing, then you would be crossing a crocodile lake through a rope and ending the episode by swimming across an ocean full of sharks!

BTS: *cool and calm*

Production Team: And the winner gets two packs of instant noodles!!

BTS:

summary: BTS Imagine // Meeting Jimin for the first time
title: BTS Imagine // Meeting Jimin for the first time
body:
Park Jimin

warnings: Christmas fluff has begun

length: 614 words

Other Members: Kim Seokjin | Min Yoongi | Jung Hoseok | Kim Namjoon | Kim Taehyung | Jeon Jungkook

This Christmas, Jimin had decided to visit the local children’s hospital.

Manager Sejin was good friends with the director of recreational activities at the hospital and had arranged for some special one-on-one visits with Jimin and the children.

“Thank you again for coming today. I’ve arranged for one of our head volunteers to guide you around today as you meet the children. Y/N, this is Mr. Park,” the director introduced you.

Jimin thought you looked adorable. You were wearing a Santa hat with the coziest ugly Christmas sweater. The sweater even had Christmas lights.

“Please call me Jimin. I love your outfit,” he greeted you with a big smile. You looked down at what you were wearing and gave a shy laugh.

“Actually, I thought we could match today.” You handed him a small shopping bag that contained the exact hat and sweater you were wearing. Jimin laughed and immediately got dressed in the festive outfit.

“I can see that you’re in good hands with Y/N. I’ll leave you two to it.” The director left you alone with Jimin and the two of you began your rounds through the ward.

Jimin enjoyed his time with the children and he was happy he could bring some Christmas joy with him. But throughout the day, he paid close attention to you too. Everyone they passed by seemed to know including the staff, parents and the kids. Much to his surprise, you were also able to greet them back by name.

While he introduced himself to the children, you often hung back to speak with the parents. More than once, he overheard you asking them how they were doing and if there was anything you could get them. If any of his band members were here right now, they would have teased him for his heart eyes.

When the two of you were finished, you offered to walk him to the underground parking lot.

“Thank you so much for coming today, Jimin. The kids don’t often get a lot of outside visitors apart from their families, so it was a real treat for them. I know a few of them are huge fans.”

“You seem to know the families well here. Do you volunteer here often, Y/N?” Jimin asked. You couldn’t help but blush a little. Here was this extremely attractive man and, judging by the eye contact he was making, his entire focus was on you

“I try to visit often – almost every weekend actually,” you responded.

“What made you start volunteering here?”

“My mom is actually the director of recreational activities here. You met her earlier. She brought me into work quite often when I was younger, and I started volunteering once I was in high school.”

“What do you outside of volunteering here?”

“Well, I’m actually studying to be a pediatric surgeon. My goal one day is to work at this hospital as a doctor.” Jimin’s steps stopped suddenly. You turned to look at him to see what was wrong and blushed when you realized he was staring at you in complete awe.

“You’re amazing.”

He had meant to say ‘that’s amazing’ but the shy smile you gave him afterwards was completely worth the slip up.

“Thank you, Jimin.”

The two of you continued walking in a comfortable silence until you reached the car that Manager Sejin had sent.

“Uh… well, see you around, I guess?” You were hesitant to leave, hoping that the moment you two shared before wasn’t just a fluke.

His bright smile was enough to erase any doubts you had.

“It’s a date,” he said.

And when you gave him your number, Jimin considered it his own little Christmas miracle.

summary:
[INFO] I BTS sono
stati nominati nel sondaggio per Person Of The Year 2018 di Time Magazine  “I BTS sono stati inclusi...
body:
[INFO] I BTS sono stati nominati nel sondaggio per Person Of The Year 2018 di Time Magazine

“I BTS sono stati inclusi nell'annuale sondaggio per Person of the Year di TIME Magazine!

Dal 1927 TIME nomina una persona o un gruppo di persone come Person of the Year per aver avuto una grande influenza nel corso degli eventi accaduti nell’anno, sia nel bene che nel male.

Anche se il Person of the Year 2018 verrà deciso dai curatori del giornale, TIME ha dichiarato che il sondaggio a cui possono votare i loro lettori “fornisce una visione preziosa sull’opinione pubblica, dando ai lettori la possibilità di dare il loro peso nella scelta.” Nel 2017 le Person of the Year di TIME furono gli uomini e le donne chiamati “Silence Breakers”, cioè coloro che hanno parlato di molestie sessuali e aggressioni avvenute in vari settori. Nel 2016 il presidente Donald Trump fu scelto come Person of the Year.

Insieme ai BTS nel sondaggio di quest’anno ci sono anche Christine Blasey Ford, il regista di “Crazy Rich Asians” Jon Chu, il regista di “Black Panther” Ryan Coogler, il CEO di Amazon Jeff Bezos, Meghan Markle, bambini senza documenti, Colin Kaepernick; politici tra cui Donald Trump, Moon Jae In, Nancy Pelosi, e altri ancora; Robert Mueller; artisti come Beyoncé, Lady Gaga e Kanye West; i sommozzatori thailandesi; e molti altri ancora.

Potete votare qui.”

Traduzione a cura di Bangtan Italian Channel Subs (©CiHope) | ©soompi

— ♡ 𝓵𝓲𝓴𝓮 𝓸𝓻 𝓻𝓮𝓫𝓵𝓸𝓰 𝓲𝓯 𝔂𝓸𝓾 𝓼𝓪𝓿𝓮 𝓸𝓻 𝓾𝓼𝓮 𝓹𝓵𝓮𝓪𝓼𝓮
